name: 2017 International Conference on Agricultural and Food Science & 7th International Conference on Biotechnology and Bioengineering (ICAFS&ICBB 2017)
content: It is one of the most professional and cutting-edge international conferences in the fields of animal & plant sciences and agricultural biotechnology. The aim of the conference is to provide worldwide specialists, scholars, and engineering technicians that are engaged in related filed a chance to exchange the latest research results, learn the latest technology and build international friendships; in particular for domestic academics. This conference sincerely invites academics, independent scholars and researchers from around the world to meet and exchange the latest ideas and views in a forum encouraging respectful dialogue. Experts and practitioners will present the latest innovations and advances, share their experience and insights, forecast the trends and opportunities. http://www.icbb.vu.edu.pk/
organizers: Asia-Pacific Association of Science, Engineering and Technology; Virtual University of Pakistan; Hig
